meanings.definition: A fatal epidemic disease, especially bubonic plague.
meanings.sent1: The town was devastated by pestilences, causing many to fall ill.
meanings.sent2: The ancient city was once ravaged by pestilences that wiped out entire populations.
meanings.sent3: The pestilences seemed to have a party in the crowded marketplace, infecting everyone in sight.
meanings.sent4: The pestilences of corruption spread through the government, infecting every decision made.
meanings.sent5: The image of pestilences creeping through the land haunted the villagers' dreams.

meanings.sent1: The factory's pollution was a pestilences to the environment, causing harm to all living creatures.
